KafkaListener
KafkaSender
ExperimentalSendersEndpointKAFKA
Experimental ISender for sending messages to a Kafka instance. The Kafka integration is still under development so do not currently use unless you wish to participate in this development.
See also
Github - KafkaSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.kafka.KafkaSender
Syntax
Copy
<KafkaSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
topic	text	-
The topic to send messages to. Only one topic per sender. Wildcards are not supported.
name	text	-
The functional name of the object.
AbstractKafkaFacade
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
bootstrapServers	text	-
The bootstrap servers to connect to, as a comma separated list.
clientId	text	-
The client id to use when connecting to the Kafka cluster.
active	text	-
